shrimp.name: OrenNayar
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Oren-Nayar diffuse term. This block has both the "qualitative" model based on Szymon Rusinkiewicz's implementation, and the full model with inter-reflections, based on Larry Gritz's implementation, depending on the content of the qualitative variable in the block. The roughness parameter controls the standard deviation of angle orientations of the surface grooves, so when roughness = 0, the term is Lambertian. The diffuse color value is passed to the aov_surfacecolor, and the diffuse value to the aov_diffuse AOV presets, only for the qualitative model (see the header for the C3 coefficient and L1 and L2 variables). The "category" variable defines the light categories used for the "illuminance" construct of this block.
